scripts.database:generate-models-1: npx sequelize-auto -o ./database/models -d postgres_db -h localhost -u admin -x admin -p 5432 -e postgres
scripts.database:generate-models: npx sequelize-auto -o ./database/models -d mysql -h localhost -u root -x root -p 3305 -e mysql
scripts.database:create-migration: npx sequelize migration:create --migrations-path database/migrations --models-path ../common/models --config database/config/config.json --name migration
scripts.database:run-container: podman run --name local_db -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=admin -e POSTGRES_USER=admin -e POSTGRES_DB=postgres_db -p 5432:5432 -d postgres
scripts.generate-typescript-and-sequelize-models: npx sequelize-auto -o ../common/models -d postgres_db -h localhost -u admin -x admin -e postgres -l ts
scripts.container-pgadmin: podman run --name postgres_admin -e PGADMIN_DEFAULT_EMAIL=admin@admin.fr -e PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD=admin -p 80:80 -p 5433:5432 -d dpage/pgadmin4
